synopsis.text: Fuuko's life is a living nightmare, as her special ability, Unluck, brings misfortune and death to anyone she touches. Despairing and alone, she decides to end her life, but fate has other plans. Enter Andy, an immortal being who has been searching for a way to die. When their paths cross, they form an unlikely partnership, with Fuuko becoming Andy's test subject in his quest for death. But their journey takes a dangerous turn as they discover a secret organization is hunting them down. As they fight for their lives, they uncover the truth behind their abilities and the world they live in. Will they find a way to end Andy's immortality, or will the organization end them first? Join Fuuko and Andy in this chaotic and thrilling adventure filled with action, mystery, and a touch of romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
